column5: Before I ask my question; I just want to say that I hope everyone in the Temagami area,  get through these fires with as little or no loss! Scary stuff!!!!! A group of us are going up to Elk Lake in a few days; we usually run strait up 11 to New Liskeard and then head west on 65 to Elk Lake. Has there been any road closures on Hwy 11 or 65, going up to and through Temagami and North of that? I don't want to put our group at risk or be in the way of response or fire fighting crews. Dan.
Thanks Terry. Great site!!!! Any first hand drivers through the area? Dan.
From what I've been hearing hwy 11 north is blocked and folks are having to detour over to the QC side  Cheers
Have a great time but stay safe.
